title: For German Fans In Berlin Beer Garden, National Pride Is No Problem
teaser: As the U.S. and German soccer teams faced off under heavy rain in Recife, Brazil, German fans were glued to their TVs in Berlin. NPR's Soraya Sarhaddi Nelson offers their reactions to the German win.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
